page.title: ServerlessDays London - News
page.description: One Day. One Track. One Community

lead.headline: It's nearly time for ServerlessDays 2019!
lead.description: The excitement is building, the attendees are gathering, the servers are quaking in their racks... ServerlessDays London 2019 on Thursday July 11th is almost upon us!

posts.headline: Announcing Workshops
posts.description: We're delighted to announce our workshops for 2019. We have 4 workshops from Thundra, IBM, AWS and Google.

posts.headline: Full Lineup and Agenda Announced
posts.description: The agenda and full lineup for ServerlessDays London is up! Check out our remaining speakers including Jennifer Davis, Chris Munns, Kas Perch, Roberto Diaz, Alexandra Abbas, Dan Bass, & Sheen Brisals

posts.headline: Announcing Keynotes and Speakers
posts.description: We're delighted to announce our keynotes and some of our first speakers. We're joined by Teri Radichel, Lin Clark, Till Schneidereit, and Sarah Drasner.

posts.headline: Announcing ServerlessDays London 2019
posts.description: ServerlessDays London 2019 is happening on 11 July at Imperial College, South Kensington. New venue, expanded program, more Serverless! Get your Serverless on!
